languages.text: "Не вздумай еще раз сорваться — второй раз нянчиться с тобой не стану".
"Do not lose control like that again — I will not let you off so easy next time."
languages.original_text: "Не вздумай еще раз сорваться — второй раз нянчиться с тобой не стану".

traits.locale_text: "Do not lose control again — I will not let you off so easy next time."
"Do not lose control again — I will not let you off so easy next time."
"Do not lose control like that again — I will not let you off so easy next time."
"Do not lose control like that again — I will not let you off so easy next time."
"Do not lose control like that again — I will not let you off so easy next time."
"Do not lose control like that again — I will not let you off so easy next time."

languages.text: 「もう二度とあんなふうに取り乱すな。次は容赦しない」
languages.original_text: "Do not lose control like that again — I will not let you off so easy next time."

traits.locale_text: 「もう二度とあんなふうに取り乱すな。次は容赦しない」

languages.text: "Verliert nicht noch einmal so die Kontrolle – beim nächsten Mal kommt Ihr nicht mehr so leicht davon."
languages.original_text: "Do not lose control like that again — I will not let you off so easy next time."

traits.locale_text: "Verliert nicht noch einmal so die Kontrolle – beim nächsten Mal kommt Ihr nicht mehr so leicht davon."

languages.text: « Ne vous avisez plus jamais de vous laisser aller ainsi. Je ne tolérerai pas un tel comportement une deuxième fois. »
languages.original_text: "Do not lose control like that again — I will not let you off so easy next time."

traits.locale_text: « Ne vous avisez plus jamais de vous laisser aller ainsi. Je ne tolérerai pas un tel comportement une deuxième fois. »

languages.text: «No vuelva a perder el control de ese modo; la próxima vez no seré tan indulgente».
languages.original_text: "Do not lose control like that again — I will not let you off so easy next time."

traits.locale_text: «No vuelva a perder el control de ese modo; la próxima vez no seré tan indulgente».

languages.text: “别再像那样失控了，下次我可不会这么简简单单放过你。”
languages.original_text: "Do not lose control like that again — I will not let you off so easy next time."

traits.locale_text: “别再像那样失控了，下次我可不会这么简简单单放过你。”

languages.text: "Bir daha bu denli dağıldığını görmeyeceğim. Yoksa elimden kolay kolay kurtulamazsın."
languages.original_text: "Do not lose control like that again — I will not let you off so easy next time."

traits.locale_text: "Bir daha bu denli dağıldığını görmeyeceğim. Yoksa elimden kolay kolay kurtulamazsın."
